task_summary: The robot locates, grasps, and opens the oven door in a standard kitchen environment, ensuring safe and correct operation.

task_long_description.overview: This behavior tree directs a fixed-base manipulator to open a lower oven door. The robot uses visual perception to find the oven door, aligns and approaches, computes and executes a side-on grasp on the handle, actuates the door open, confirms success, and finally retreats to a safe distance. The workspace includes a countertop, sink, and visible appliance surfaces. The robot must account for occlusions and correct pose estimation, employing moderate force and precision but has no explicit retry or force constraints dictated by the instruction or frames.
preconditions: Robot arm has free access to the oven door
No objects obstructing oven handle area
stepwise_plan: Check if oven door is visible or detect it
Approach and align with oven door
Compute grasp pose from the side
Grasp oven door at computed pose
Open oven door using open action
Retreat robot arm from oven area
success_criteria: Oven door is detected and grasped
Oven door is found open after the action
Robot arm is safely clear after opening
failure_and_recovery: Failure: Oven not visible. Recovery: Retry detection.
Failure: Grasp fails. Recovery: Re-compute pose.
Failure: Door does not open. Recovery: Confirm grasp or pull again.
Failure: Arm collision or occlusion. Recovery: Abort and move to safe position.
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when the oven door is confirmed open and the arm is retracted.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the oven door is currently visible.
Detect the oven door in the workspace for perception alignment.
Approach the oven door and align gripper within 5mm tolerance.
Compute a grasp pose on the oven door, side strategy.
Move to and grasp at the computed oven door pose (side).
Actuate the oven door to open using door logic.
Verify the oven door is currently open.
Move the arm back by 0.1m after successful door opening.

failure_modes: Failed grasp due to poor pose
assumptions: The contact-sheet visually confirms the robot performs a staged oven door opening (frames 0–8).
The oven door is physically graspable and within reach during the task.
Task instruction did not specify force, tolerance, or retry; these are set to reasonable workspace defaults.
Handle not distinctly visible in all frames—'oven_door' is used as symbolic target for both detection and action.

expected_success_criteria: Oven door found and manipulated with correct sequence
Oven door is verifiably open at the end
Robot is clear of oven after opening
